name: Trans Iowa

organizer.name: Guitar Ted Productions
organizer.note: Race series ran 2005-2018, now legendary in gravel history

distances.name: Full Distance
distances.description: Ultra-endurance crossing of Iowa on gravel roads, typically ran late April

terrain: Iowa gravel roads - rolling farmland, B-level maintenance roads, potentially muddy spring conditions
registration: By invitation only - limited to 120 riders (historical)
weather: Unpredictable Iowa spring - cold nights (30s-40sÂ°F), variable days, frequent rain and mud, occasionally snow
uniqueCharacteristics: Completely free to enter - no registration fees
Self-supported format with no aid stations or course marking
Infamous for brutal spring weather and mud
Inspired the modern gravel racing movement
Guitar Ted's handwritten cue sheets became iconic
No prizes or awards - just bragging rights
Considered one of the toughest gravel events ever created
popularity: Legendary - foundational event in gravel racing history
note: Trans Iowa ended in 2018 after 14 editions. Included as historical record of gravel racing's origins.
